title: Keep the UI accent color orange (replace current gold accents)

requirements.text: Update the app’s accent styling so the interface remains orange (replace the current gold accent tokens/usages with an orange accent), while keeping the existing dark theme, typography, and layout unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: Primary/accent UI elements that currently render with the 'gold' accent (e.g., star ratings, filter sheet borders/buttons, badges) render with an orange accent instead.
No new UI features are introduced; only color styling changes.
All user-visible text remains in English (no new Japanese UI strings are added).

requirements.text: Ensure the star rating visuals (including half-star gradient fill) use the orange accent consistently.
acceptanceCriteria: Filled stars and half-star gradient use the same orange accent color as the rest of the app.
Unfilled stars remain visually subdued on the dark background (no change in behavior, only consistent accent color).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing components instead).
Do not edit any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Changing backend data models or Motoko canister logic.
Adding new pages, flows, or features beyond updating the accent color styling.
